channel.title: Linux help(server related aswell as client) will rep anyone who helps!
channel.description:
Alrighty, so im on Linux ubuntu and I am having troubles running my server and my client... Can anyone help me i ran gedit. But i do not know what to convert this to [code]@echo off title rs2hd compiler echo Preparing... mkdir bin cd src copy log4j.xml .. cd .. move log4j.xml bin/ echo Compiling core... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo completed... echo running server... title Server. java -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar com.rs2hd.Main pause [/code] That right there is my run.bat file...
My compiler works fine for some reason. Can anyone help me?

item.title: Linux help(server related aswell as client) will rep anyone who helps!
item.dc:creator: @Wildyscape562 Wildyscape562
item.description:
@Wildyscape562 wrote:

Tried that, my screen flickers when im using .bat and .sh so i couldn’t copy or see what i got but it didnt work, it ran through alot in Terminal but it shut down…

Read full topic
item.source: Linux help(server related aswell as client) will rep anyone who helps!

item.title: Linux help(server related aswell as client) will rep anyone who helps!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Try this.

set +vecho off
title rs2hd cmpiler
echo Preparing...
mkls -l bin
cd src
cp log4j.xml ..
cd ..
mv log4j.xml bin/
echo cmpiling core...
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -source src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java
echo cmpleted...
echo running server...
title Server.
java -Xmx1024m -class bin;deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar com.rs2hd.Main
sleep

Read full topic
item.source: Linux help(server related aswell as client) will rep anyone who helps!

item.title: Linux help(server related aswell as client) will rep anyone who helps!
item.dc:creator: @mark033 mark033
item.description:
@mark033 wrote:

The first part of that is compiling the code (javac = java compile(r?)).

To get the libraries working (seeing as I’m not very good at this stuff) I just un-zip them in the source folder. If you do that you can just go to terminal, use cd to load the filepath and then use ‘java -Xmx1024m com.rs2hd.Main’.

As I said, I’m not very good at this stuff, and I usually work by doing and working off the errors I see so I might not be great help, but that’s what I’d do.

Read full topic
item.source: Linux help(server related aswell as client) will rep anyone who helps!
